; D[0..7]	= UD[0..7]
; D16		= PA2
; D17 		= _PC

d0

; First address setup
d$00020000
d$00030000
d$00030000

; Sending _PC timed data, note there is no data setup time, like the C64
; There is also a longer held time (_PC = 1), to simulate the delay between opcodes storing data to the user port.
; For example, the fastest write to the user port is sta absolute, which is 4 cycles
d$00010001
d$00030001
d$00030001

d$00010010
d$00030010
d$00030010

d$00010002
d$00030002
d$00030002

d$00010001
d$00030001
d$00030001

d$00010002
d$00030002
d$00030002

d$00010082
d$00030082
d$00030082

d$00010081
d$00030081
d$00030081

d$00030000
d$00030000
d$00030000
d$00030000
d$00030000
d$00030000


; Second address setup; Second address setup
d$00020000
d$00030000
d$00020000
d$00030000

d$00010001
d$00030001
d$00030001

d$00010024
d$00030024
d$00030024

d$00010001
d$00030001
d$00030001

d$00010011
d$00030011
d$00030011

d$00010022
d$00030022
d$00030022

d$00010032
d$00030032
d$00030032

d$00010041
d$00030041
d$00030041

d$00030000
d$00030000
d$00030000
d$00030000
d$00030000
d$00030000
